subject: Lotus Bank Limited
body:
Lotus Bank Limited
2 Bourdillion Rd, Ikoye Lagos
PH:0700 5688 72265
E=mail:LOTUSBANKPLC@financier.com
Attn:Sir
This is to inform the bearer that we have received notfication from the
apex bank to credit your interest rate on your fund deposited on your
behalf by CBN.The accrued interest was generated from your
USD$20,000,000 deposited by the Apex bank, tagged{Inheritance fund} .
The fund has been fixed deposited with us for the last 2 years  and
has generated interest of USD$500,000.00.The MOU signed compiled us
LOTUS BANK LTD to pay you the interest accumulated after every two
years.
You are adviced to to fill the KYC attached file immediately and
return back to the office.
Regards
Kafilat ARAOYE
Managing Director/CEO - LOTUS Bank

subject: Re:   Lotus Bank Limited
body:
Dear Kafilat Araoye,

Thank you for your email. I am interested in the accrued interest on my deposited fund. However, I did not receive any KYC (Know Your Customer) form attached to your email.

Could you please resend the form so that I can fill it out and return it back to your office?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Lotus Bank Limited
body:
Attn:Thomas 
 
Attached id the Form. 
Sorry to know that you didn't receive it earlier. 
 
Kafilat Araoye, 
 
 
 Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2024 at 12:34 PM From: "Thomas" <te14474@***.com> To: lotusbankplc@financier.com Subject: Re: Lotus Bank Limited 
 
Dear Kafilat Araoye, 
Thank you for your email. I am interested in the accrued interest on my deposited fund. However, I did not receive any KYC (Know Your Customer) form attached to your email. 
Could you please resend the form so that I can fill it out and return it back to your office?
Best wishes, 
Thomas

subject: Re: Lotus Bank Limited
body:
Dear Thomas,

I apologize for the oversight. I have attached the KYC (Know Your Customer) form to this email. Please fill it out and return it at your earliest convenience.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Find attached file
body:
Dear Mr Thomas, 
Thank you for your oversight, I really apprecoate it 
 
The I have attached the KYC (Know Your Customer) form to this email. Please fill it out and return it at your earliest convenience. 
 
Regards 
 
Kafilat ARAOYE 
Managing Director/CEO - LOTUS Bank

subject: Re: Find attached file
body:
Dear Kafilat,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing the KYC form. I will fill it out and return it to you as soon as possible.

Best wishes,
Thomas
